title: Historic Dongdan Market Reopens with Digital Payment (Beijing Municipal Government)
text: ( Source : Beijing Municipal Government ) The traditional Dongdan Market at Hepingli reopened on September 26 after having been closed some 18 years ago. Located in one of the oldest parts of Dongcheng District , the original market area was
